query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accounts) as accounts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fiscalPeriods) as fiscal_periods_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices) as invoices_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bills) as bills_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments) as payments_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bankAccounts) as bank_accounts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenses) as expenses_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenseCategories) as expense_categories_count
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VCDwJ3cd5ekhng.root --database BnbuGpJyxab4suPN4jFq3M --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accounts) as accounts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fiscalPeriods) as fiscal_periods_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices) as invoices_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bills) as bills_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments) as payments_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bankAccounts) as bank_accounts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenses) as expenses_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenseCategories) as expense_categories_count
